name: Bruce Isaac
descriptions: Bruce Isaac is a singer hiding out in Novac in 2281.
Bruce previously was a singer at the Shark Club in New Reno, who the Courier saw singing there.
Talent Pool: Tommy Torini is looking for a new singer. The player character can inform Bruce about a job opportunity for him at the Aces, the theater in the Tops.

topics.topic_text: Why would this Mr. Bishop be after you?
topics.response_text: Oh, well, that's all just a big misunderstanding, see.

topics.topic_text: Why did you come all the way out here from New Reno?
topics.response_text: You don't know Mr. Bishop. He's not like the other bosses up there. He knows the Wasteland like the back of his hand, and he likes to wander it.

topics.topic_text: If you're looking for work, Tommy Torini is hiring singers at the Tops.
topics.response_text: Really? The Tops, huh? Well, it's no Shark Club, but I hear security on the Strip is real tight. Even Mr. Bishop wouldn't hit a joint like that.
Ahhh! Please don't kill me, I swear I'll have - wait. You... you don't work for Mr. Bishop, do you?

topics.topic_text: No, I don't. What makes you think that?
topics.response_text: Sorry, it's just... you look like his type, y'know? You got that hard-ass wasteland explorer thing going on.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> Yeah, I do, and it's time for you to suffer!
Aren't you that singer from New Reno? I think I saw you play the clubs there.
topics.response_text: Oh, so you have heard of me. Yeah, that's right. I was the big draw at the Shark Club, people used to pay hundreds of caps to see me.
"Robbed" is such an ugly word. It's more like I took care of a payroll problem for him.

topics.topic_text: And so because of that you ran all the way to Novac?
topics.response_text: I figured it might take him a while to understand his accounting error and cool down a little.

topics.topic_text: Wow. My hat is off to you, that takes some balls.
topics.response_text: Thanks, but if Bishop finds me and I don't have his money,{emphasis}my balls are going to be on his trophy wall.

topics.topic_text: You really don't know when to quit, do you?
topics.response_text: I guess I don't. That's why I'm here.

topics.topic_text: That's a tough break. Good luck with that.
I'll let you know if I find any work for a singer.
topics.response_text: You'd do that? Great! I really appreciate that!
